database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS_mouse_embryo_nanoDESI_PNAS2013_Hsu -- raw Thermo files
entry.description: This the data set collected in targeted (data dependent) manner using nanoDESI microscope regarding some high abundant small molecules associated with mouse embryogenesis. All of the spectra have been published in PNAS 2013 110 (37), 14855-14860 by CC Hsu and et al.
